entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow near the American border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
